mapper.select: SELECT c.con_Id,o.o_Id,zong,o.o_CreateTime,o.o_CanZhuo,o.o_UserId FROM (SELECT Sum(m.m_Price) as zong,c.con_Id,c.con_OrderId FROM menu AS m INNER JOIN diancan AS d ON m.m_Id = d.d_Menu INNER JOIN consumption AS c ON c.con_OrderId = d.d_OrderId GROUP BY c.con_OrderId ) as c INNER JOIN `order` as o ON o.o_Id = c.con_OrderId limit #{start},#{limit}

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT Sum(m.m_Price),c.con_Id,c.con_OrderId FROM menu AS m INNER JOIN diancan AS d ON m.m_Id = d.d_Menu INNER JOIN consumption AS c ON c.con_OrderId = d.d_OrderId GROUP BY c.con_OrderId ) as c INNER JOIN `order` as o ON o.o_Id = c.con_OrderId
